subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Royce White, who leads eighth-seeded Iowa State into Thursday’s South Region game against ninth-seeded Connecticut, appears to have finally found a smooth path on and off the court.
snippet: Royce White, who leads eighth-seeded Iowa State into Thursday’s South Region game against ninth-seeded Connecticut, appears to have finally found a smooth path on and off the court.
